text: Winding Paths is a book containing a collection of photographs taken by British author Bruce Chatwin during his various travels. These include photographs from the period when he was writing his other works: In Patagonia, The Viceroy of Ouidah, On the Black Hill, The Songlines and Utz. Category:Photographic collections and books Category:1998 non-fiction books Category:Books by Bruce Chatwin Category:Jonathan Cape books
title: Winding Paths
